title: Synthesis, structural and magnetic properties of cobalt(II) complexes with pyridine-based macrocyclic ligand containing two pyridine pendant arms
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28138-28147
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02387K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Eva Zahradníková, Céline Pichon, Carine Duhayon, Jean-Pascal Sutter, Petr Halaš, Bohuslav Drahoš
Substantial magnetic anisotropy and SMM behavior was achieved using a series of distorted six-coordinate Co(II) complexes with a 17-membered macrocyclic ligand containing two pyridine pendant arms.
